response.msg:
嗯，用户查询的是"关注第八届进博会"，我需要从众多搜索结果中整理出关于第八届进博会的最新最全面的信息。今天是2025年11月2日，距离进博会开幕只有3天时间了。

我先浏览了所有46个搜索结果，发现有很多关键信息点。从核心数据看，这届进博会规模确实很大，有155个国家地区参与，4108家境外企业参展，展览面积超过43万平方米，还有461项新产品新技术新服务展示。这些数据说明进博会确实越办越大了。

参展企业方面很有意思，我看到西门子医疗展区有1000平方米，是医疗器械展区最大的，他们还带来了什么光子计数CT这种高端设备。罗氏制药有40多款产品参展，大众汽车也要带四大品牌八款车型来。特斯拉的Cybercab无人驾驶出租车要亚太首秀，这些国际大企业都很重视。

亮点展品方面，花王带来了什么琉光修红系列新品，日本那个本间哲朗还要当"导游朗叔"带大家看进博。联合国儿童基金会也有展台在5.2号馆，挺特别的。

志愿者服务这块，"小叶子"们已经宣誓上岗了，有3865人参加，还首次成立了小语种志愿者联盟，看来服务会更专业。交通保障方面，上海做了很多安排，新增了2000多个停车位，浦东机场还新开了进博专线。

筹备进度上，首批展品10月23日就入馆了，现在布展应该进入最后阶段。不过11月4日晚上外滩那边会有些交通管制，去看灯光秀的人要注意。

有个资料总结得很全面，说这届进博会有170家企业和27家机构是"八年全勤生"，还首次设立了最不发达国家产品专区。虹桥论坛请了8位诺贝尔奖得主，规格很高。

最后提醒大家，11月5日正式开幕，6-10日是专业观众日，9-10日才对普通观众开放。想去的可以通过"随申行"预约停车，或者坐71路进博专线。

这些信息都挺新的，基本都是10月下旬到11月初发布的，应该很可靠。特别是那些媒体账号和认证账号发布的内容，可信度更高些。有些个人账号的内容我就不重点引用了。


以下是第八届中国国际进口博览会（2025年）的核心信息整合，综合官方发布、企业动态及服务指南：
### **一、基础信息**
1. **时间与地点**
- **展期**：2025年11月5日-10日
- **地点**：国家会展中心（上海）
- **普通观众开放日**：11月9日-10日（需提前预约）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [9, 13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226660800501876", "index": 13, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "上海发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228109131415594", "index": 9, "label": ""}], "name": "央视新闻", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/002TLsr9ly8i653ifvwbtj60j60j6aai02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=9tpHP5y3yC", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226660800501876", "vType": 3}}```

2. **规模与参与方**
- **展览面积**：超43万平方米（历届最大）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [1, 33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中国水运杂志", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227823742322093", "index": 33, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "本間哲朗", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227719010551606", "index": 1, "label": ""}], "name": "中国水运杂志", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.996.996.50/aa55ed30ly8gdyxsb2d5yj20ro0rogmn.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=pT4TfR000T", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227823742322093", "vType": 3}}```
- **参展企业**：4108家境外企业，含290家世界500强及行业龙头```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [1, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "看看新闻全球眼", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228139903191772", "index": 27, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "本間哲朗", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227719010551606", "index": 1, "label": ""}], "name": "看看新闻全球眼", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.26.33.444.444.50/006QdsUUly8h8w2g4w552j30dw0dwdgd.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=XBcE78c9Ob", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228139903191772", "vType": 3}}```
- **国家/地区**：155个国家和国际组织参与```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [21, 33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视财经", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228448129746578", "index": 21, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "中国水运杂志", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227823742322093", "index": 33, "label": ""}], "name": "央视财经", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.700.700.50/002sRokily8h8vg8b1kf7j60jg0jgwf602.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=FHgYlPqJGV", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228448129746578", "vType": 3}}```
### **二、核心亮点**
#### **前沿展品与技术**
1. **医疗器械与健康**
- 西门子医疗：亚洲首秀“光子计数CT”，助力精准医疗；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "浦东时报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227900161753336", "index": 32, "label": "大v"}], "name": "浦东时报", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.996.996.50/991c89e8ly8h8vgnuwfw9j20ro0rpwfn.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=%2FTAlzkWD92", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227900161753336", "vType": 3}}```
- 罗氏制药：首发抗CD20单抗“佳罗华”及眼科植入物PDS。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "浦东时报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227900161753336", "index": 32, "label": ""}]}}```
2. **智能科技**
- 特斯拉：亚太首秀无人驾驶出租车Cybercab（成本＜3万美元）；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [39], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "IT之家", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227467669505104", "index": 39, "label": "大v"}], "name": "IT之家", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/001ZzMwgly8gurhm3cm5jj60go0godfv02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=EKiaqFkZwe", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227467669505104", "vType": 3}}```
- 海克斯康：工业人形机器人AEON，应对高精度作业场景。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [11], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上海发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225031799673727", "index": 11, "label": "大v"}], "name": "上海发布", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.640.640.50/002LTpVoly1h8vidpaln1j60hs0hst9f02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=vUuce0fjUu", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225031799673727", "vType": 1}}```
3. **消费与生活**
- 花王集团：珂润“轻龄弹润琉光修红系列”、碧柔升级防晒液；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [8, 41], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "日本花王", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955802553038", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "日本花王", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227854901281662", "index": 41, "label": ""}]}}```
- 大众汽车：携四大品牌、八款车型亮相，展示智能化成果。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [38], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财经杂志", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228606693578269", "index": 38, "label": "大v"}], "name": "财经杂志", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.12.0.1049.1049.50/001PXWsJly8h8v8abgp2lj60u00u2t9l02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=STwJ3loHeO", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228606693578269", "vType": 3}}```
日本花王
日本花王

#### **专区创新**
- **国际友城联展**：新增哈萨克斯坦阿拉木图市等展团；
- **最不发达国家产品专区**：推动53个非洲建交国产品零关税入华。
### **三、配套活动与论坛**
1. **虹桥国际经济论坛**
- **议题**：33场分论坛及闭门会，聚焦人工智能、绿色低碳等；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 30, "data": {"num": [33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中国水运杂志", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227823742322093", "index": 33, "label": ""}]}}```
- **嘉宾**：8位诺贝尔奖得主、400余位全球政商学界人士。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 31, "data": {"num": [27, 33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "看看新闻全球眼", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228139903191772", "index": 27, "label": ""}, {"name": "中国水运杂志", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227823742322093", "index": 33, "label": ""}]}}```
2. **特别活动**
- 联合国儿童基金会边会：探讨人道主义供应链（11月7日）；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 33, "data": {"num": [34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "联合国儿童基金会", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227460610491034", "index": 34, "label": "大v"}], "name": "联合国儿童基金会", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.17.7.670.670.50/6843b943ly8gk7k1zqi1hj20j60j6aau.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=4uP4%2Fj%2F77h", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227460610491034", "vType": 1}}```
- 全球南方农业可持续发展论坛：商务部与央视联合承办。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 34, "data": {"num": [42], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视三农", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226671461893822", "index": 42, "label": "大v"}], "name": "央视三农", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/007XX2J2ly8hw91nmkhqqj30go0go75j.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=djPWhgKpCU", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226671461893822", "vType": 3}}```
### **四、服务与保障**
#### **交通指南**
- **停车预约**：通过“上海停车”APP或“随申行”预约15处停车场；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 38, "data": {"num": [9], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上海发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228109131415594", "index": 9, "label": ""}]}}```
- **即停即走下客点**：P0、P1、P6、P8、P15停车场；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 39, "data": {"num": [12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "东方卫视番茄台", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227079646839820", "index": 12, "label": ""}], "name": "东方卫视番茄台", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.500.500.50/001VDYkMly8hx9ufk04czj60dw0dwmxd02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=OrH2KH8EoB", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227079646839820", "vType": 3}}```
- **公交接驳**：
- 71路进博专线（免费，凭证件乘车）；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 41, "data": {"num": [12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "东方卫视番茄台", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227079646839820", "index": 12, "label": ""}]}}```
- 新增浦东机场进博专线，配行李寄存服务。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 42, "data": {"num": [9], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上海发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228109131415594", "index": 9, "label": ""}]}}```
#### **便民措施**
- **证件复用**：第五至七届进博会证件可复用；
- **电子口岸签证**：外籍展客商全程网办入境；
- **志愿者服务**：3865名“小叶子”上岗，含小语种志愿者联盟。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 46, "data": {"num": [10, 44], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "看看新闻Knews", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227203277357680", "index": 10, "label": ""}, {"name": "上海校园", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227417028267603", "index": 44, "label": ""}], "name": "看看新闻Knews", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.410.410.50/6e05a6daly1h8vg7kmg7ej20be0bemxf.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=MKg0sfMfNA", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227203277357680", "vType": 3}}```
### **五、城市联动与溢出效应**
- **静安区**：设全球服务商、“美创静界”、张园三大展区，53家企业参展；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 49, "data": {"num": [29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上海静安", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228134643532414", "index": 29, "label": ""}], "name": "上海静安", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/97803bd9ly8hp9cnmx91xj20go0godgv.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=0yWJAsuFrd", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228134643532414", "vType": 1}}```
- **昌平区**：赴上海、成都、重庆靶向招商，聚焦美丽健康产业；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 50, "data": {"num": [43], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "北京昌平", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227809603061899", "index": 43, "label": ""}], "name": "北京昌平", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/961b0597ly8i0irixyktcj20go0go3zb.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762103998&ssig=OK3gSY9Xvu", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227809603061899", "vType": 1}}```
- **青浦区**：组建355人“招商百人团”，对接280家参展企业。
### **六、重要提示**
- **交通管制**：11月4日-5日外滩、延安高架等部分区域临时管控；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 54, "data": {"num": [15], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上海发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228497397875641", "index": 15, "label": ""}]}}```
- **展品通关**：首批展品10月23日入馆，含佳沃沙漠脆脆莓等农产品。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 55, "data": {"num": [11], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上海发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225031799673727", "index": 11, "label": ""}]}}```

第八届进博会以“确定性”应对全球不确定性，通过开放合作深化国际经贸纽带。建议观众提前规划行程，关注“随申行”实时交通信息。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 56, "data": {"num": [33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中国水运杂志", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227823742322093", "index": 33, "label": ""}]}}```
response.share_text: #关注第八届进博会#的相关内容，来智搜看看
